title: Warrenomics
description: As Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass) jumps into the 2020 Presidential race, Kate and Luigi examine her legislative record and economic policy proposals, including several bold ideas to reform American capitalism.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
